mapper.sql: rul_id, rul_name, is_discount, discount, sort_code, created_time, updated_time, created_id, updated_id
mapper.select: select a.rul_id as rul_id, a.rul_name as rul_name, a.sort_code as sort_code, b.shop_id as shop_shop_id, b.shop_name as shop_shop_name, shop.shop_code as shop_shop_code, shop.enabled as shop_enabled, c.sku_id as sku_sku_id, c.category_code as sku_category_code, c.product_type as sku_product_type, c.sku as sku_sku, c.brand_code as sku_brand_code, c.goods_name as sku_goods_name, c.en_name as sku_en_name, c.property as sku_property, c.market_price as sku_market_price, c.sale_price as sku_sale_price, c.last_sale_price as sku_last_sale_price, c.cost_price as sku_cost_price, c.vip_price as sku_vip_price, c.unit as sku_unit, c.unit_name as sku_unit_name, c.keywords as sku_keywords, c.created_time as sku_created_time from bus_rul_price a left join bus_rul_shop b on a.rul_id = b.rul_id left join bus_shop shop on b.shop_id = shop.shop_id left join bus_rul_sku c on a.rul_id = c.rul_id where a.rul_id = #{rulId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into bus_rul_price
rul_id,
rul_name,
is_discount,
discount,
sort_code,
created_time,
updated_time,
created_id,
updated_id,

mapper.update:
update bus_rul_price
rul_name = #{rulName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_discount = #{isDiscount,jdbcType=BIT},
discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sort_code = #{sortCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_id = #{createdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_id = #{updatedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where rul_id = #{rulId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bus_rul_price set rul_name = #{rulName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_discount = #{isDiscount,jdbcType=BIT}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sort_code = #{sortCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_id = #{createdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_id = #{updatedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rul_id = #{rulId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
